label: Configuration Files
query: site:{input} filetype:env OR filetype:config OR filetype:ini OR filetype:conf
description: Find configuration files that may contain sensitive data

label: Database Files
query: site:{input} filetype:sql OR filetype:db OR filetype:sqlite

label: API Keys
query: site:{input} intext:"api_key" OR intext:"apikey" OR intext:"api-key"

label: Private Keys
query: site:{input} filetype:pem OR filetype:key OR intext:"BEGIN PRIVATE KEY"

label: Connection Strings
query: site:{input} intext:"connection string" OR intext:"jdbc:" OR intext:"mongodb://"

label: Email Credentials
description: Search for email configuration with passwords

label: SSH Keys
query: site:{input} filetype:pem OR intext:"BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY"

label: Token Leaks
query: site:{input} intext:"token" OR intext:"bearer" OR intext:"authorization"

label: Internal Documents
query: site:{input} intitle:"confidential" OR intitle:"internal only" filetype:pdf
